Authors:
Sirinapa Konta, Sajeewa Maharachchikumbura, Indunil
Chinthani Senanayake, Eric H.C. McKenzie, Marc Stadler, Saranyaphat
Boonmee, Rungtiwa Phookamsak, Ruvishika Shehali Jayawardena, Chanokned
Senwanna, Kevin D Hyde, Abdallah M Elgorban, Prapassorn Damrongkool
Eungwanichayapant
Title:
A new genus Allodiatrype, five new species and a new host
record of diatrypaceous fungi from palms (Arecaceae)
Keywords:
6 novel taxa  Diatrypaceae  morphology  palm fungi 
phylogeny  Thai fungi  Xylariales
Abstract:
Diatrypaceous fungi on palms (Arecaceae) in Thailand were
collected and identified based on morphological characteristics as well
as combined sequence analyses (ITS and TUB2). One new genus
Allodiatrype, and five new species, Allocryptovalsa elaeidis,
Allodiatrype arengae, A. elaeidicola, A. elaeidis and Diatrypella
elaeidis are introduced. A checklist of Diatrypaceae occurring on palms
(Arecaceae) and Thai diatrypaceous fungi is also provided.
